Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WZMediaConfig.CROP_TO_FRAME 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WZMediaConfig.FILL_FRAME 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.graphics.WZBitmap.SURFACE_HEIGHT
    use WZBitmap.FRAME_HEIGHT instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.graphics.WZBitmap.SURFACE_WIDTH
    use WZBitmap.FRAME_WIDTH instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.checkEglError(String)
    use WZGLES.checkForEglError(String)
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.EglEnv.createEglSurface(EGLDisplay, EGLSurface, Surface) 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.endStreaming()
    create a WZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.endStreaming(WZStatusCallback)
    create a WZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getAudioDevice()
    create a WZAudioDevice instance to use with WZBroadcastConfig.setAudioBroadcaster(WZBroadcastAPI.AudioBroadcaster)
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZCameraView.getAvailableDeviceCameras()
    As of v1.1, this method has been moved to WZCamera.getAvailableDeviceCameras()
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.EglEnv.getBaseSurfaceSize() 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZCameraView.getBroadcaster()
    The WZCameraView class now implements the WZBroadcastAPI.VideoBroadcaster interface so you can use a WZCameraView instance directly in WZBroadcastConfig.setVideoBroadcaster(WZBroadcastAPI.VideoBroadcaster) e.g. broadcastConfig.setVideoBroadcaster(cameraView);
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast.WZBroadcast.getBroadcastStatus()
    use WZBroadcast.getStatus() instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZCameraView.getCameraInfo()
    As of v1.1, this method has been moved to WZCamera.getCameraInfo()
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getCameraView()
    create a WZCameraView instance in your application layout or construct one dynamically to use with WZBroadcastConfig.setVideoBroadcaster(WZBroadcastAPI.VideoBroadcaster)
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getConfig()
    create a WZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WZBroadcast instance directly
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getDefaultAudioDevice()
    create a WZAudioDevice instance to use with WZBroadcastConfig.setAudioBroadcaster(WZBroadcastAPI.AudioBroadcaster)
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getDefaultBroadcastConfig()
    create a WZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a WZBroadcast instance
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZCameraView.getDeviceCameras()
    As of v1.1, this method has been moved to WZCamera.getDeviceCameras()
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZCameraView.getDeviceOrientation()
    As of v1.1, the preferred method for retrieving this information is WZDeviceUtils.getDeviceOrientation(Context) in the WZDeviceUtils class
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.EglEnv.getEglBaseSurface() 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.getEglInfo()
    use WZGLES.getEglInfo(boolean) instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WZMediaConfig.getLabel(boolean, boolean, boolean) 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.EglEnv.getNativeSurface() 
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZCameraView.getNumberOfDeviceCameras()
    As of v1.1, this method has been moved to WZCamera.getNumberOfDeviceCameras()
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.getStatus()
    create a WZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session and retrieve it's status using WZBroadcast.getStatus()
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.broadcast.WZBroadcastAPI.Broadcaster.getStatus()
    use getBroadcasterStatus() instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZCameraView.getStatus()
    Use WZCameraView.getPreviewStatus() instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZDeviceUtils.getSurfaceRotation(Context)
    Use WZDeviceUtils.getDeviceRotation(Context) instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.EglEnv.getTextureId()
    do not use EglEnv to track texture ids
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.hasPermission(Context, String)
    due to the wide variation in the Android permission model introduced with Marshmallow it is recommended to handle permissions directly in your native application code
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.hasPermissions(Context, String[])
    due to the wide variation in the Android permission model introduced with Marshmallow it is recommended to handle permissions directly in your native application code
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.isMuted()
    create a WZAudioDevice instance to stream and control audio input devices
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.devices.WZCameraView.isPaused()
    Use WZCameraView.isPreviewPaused() instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.isStreaming()
    create a WZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.muteAudio()
    create a WZAudioDevice instance to stream and control audio input devices
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WZMediaConfig.orientationToSurfaceRotation(int)
    Use WZMediaConfig.orientationToRotation(int) instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setCameraView(WZCameraView)
    use a WZCameraView instance created in your application layout or constructed dynamically directly to display and control the camera preview display
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setConfig(WowzaConfig)
    create a WZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WZBroadcast instance directly
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setConfig(WowzaConfig, boolean)
    create a WZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WZBroadcast instance directly
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setConfig(WZMediaConfig)
    create a WZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WZBroadcast instance directly
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.setConfig(WZMediaConfig, boolean)
    create a WZBroadcastConfig instance to configure a streaming session and use with a separately created WZBroadcast instance directly
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.EglEnv.setNativeSurface(Surface)
    Use WZGLES.EglEnv.generateEglWindowSurface(java.lang.Object) instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.android.opengl.WZGLES.EglEnv.setTextureId(int)
    do not use EglEnv to track texture ids
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.startCameraPreview()
    use WZCameraView.startPreview() instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.startCameraPreview(WZMediaConfig)
    use WZCameraView.startPreview() instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.startStreaming(WowzaConfig, WZStatusCallback)
    create a WZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.startStreaming(WZMediaConfig, WZStatusCallback)
    create a WZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.startStreaming(WZStatusCallback)
    create a WZBroadcast instance to broadcast and control a streaming session
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.stopCameraPreview()
    use WZCameraView.stopPreview() instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.configuration.WZMediaConfig.surfaceRotationToOrientation(int)
    Use WZMediaConfig.rotationToOrientation(int) instead
    com.wowza.gocoder.sdk.api.WowzaGoCoder.unmuteAudio()
    create a WZAudioDevice instance to stream and control audio input devices
